description: This Dart file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter Tic Tac Toe game, allowing users to select game modes, view rules, and navigate to the game screen.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides the main menu screen for selecting game modes and starting the game.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the HomeScreen widget, including game mode selection and navigation logic.

classes.name: _ModeTile
classes.description: A StatelessWidget used to display each game mode option with selection indication.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, including UI for mode selection, rules, and starting the game.
